thread.title: Comcast reaches $33 million settlement with California over privacy violations
thread.title_full: Comcast reaches $33 million settlement with California over privacy violations - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Comcast reaches $33 million settlement with California over privacy violations
text: (Reuters) - Comcast Corp has reached a $33 million settlement with California over allegations that the cable company posted personal details of customers online, state Attorney General Kamala Harris said in a statement on Thursday. Â»
